mapper.update:
update ams_trade_order_feed_snaps
trade_order_feed_id = #{tradeOrderFeedId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trade__price = #{tradePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
trade_volume = #{tradeVolume,jdbcType=INTEGER},
trade_date = #{tradeDate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
trade_order_feed_amount = #{tradeOrderFeedAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
trade_mark = #{tradeMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where snaps_time = #{snapsTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ams_trade_order_feed_snaps set trade_order_feed_id = #{tradeOrderFeedId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trade__price = #{tradePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, trade_volume = #{tradeVolume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, trade_date = #{tradeDate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, trade_order_feed_amount = #{tradeOrderFeedAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, trade_mark = #{tradeMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where snaps_time = #{snapsTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into ams_trade_order_feed_snaps_snaps SELECT CAST(DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3),'%Y%m%d%H%i%S%f')/1000 AS UNSIGNED),tb.* from ams_trade_order_feed_snaps as tb where snaps_time= #{snaps_time}
